messages.name: Yusif
messages.subject: This is a cool course, not gonna lie
messages.message: I like this course a lot. It gave me good knowledge about this node stuff and how this works, but especially learning how to write anything from the scratch and actually understanding how everything works in a server was a coll experience. Thanks a lot!
